## 📦 Installation

Install it with the following command:

```shell
pip install maliang-extensions
```

### 🛠️ Dependencies

Here are the only two dependencies that the project must need:

* [`typing-extensions`](https://github.com/python/typing_extensions): provide additional type hints
* [`maliang`](https://github.com/TempAccountOfMuxue1230/maliang-extensions): provide base package
